content: crochet yourself a new pet with this pattern for a fantail goldfish 1 the fish s head and body are worked continuously in the round and the fins are worked back and forth in row of blo single_crochet i have provided written instructions *and* charts for the fins gauge is unimportant -- use any heavy worsted weight yarn to get a fish that s approximately 9 nose to tail a few yarn ideas stitch nation full o sheep in clementine this is the color of the deeper orange fish lion brand vanna s baby in goldfish and red heart super saver multis in zebra it s perfect for speckled fins **note ** my numbering is off in the body section of the pattern i accidentally named two row row 12 the second row 12 should actually be row 13 here i thought i was so clever having nice round numbers but no -- round 30 the last body row is really round 31 just my numbering is off if you ignore the row numbers you ll do just fine 1 http //en wikipedia org/wiki/fantail_ goldfish
